Text.Page:
Blightwood's stench is legendary. We combat it using fragrant rosehips. The smell masks the stench and lets you breathe without retching.

I sure could use more. It's not hard to find, but I've work to do. I'll pay handsomely if you'll gather some up.

Oh ho! Well done. This will last for some time. I'll even make a tidy profit selling some to the others.

Please, take this with my thanks. You saved my nose, and that's no lie.
Did you find the fragrant rosehips? The stench is making me positively ill!
